content: Stocks Discussion Asked by AnonymousAsked 2w agoHow can we check the results of Lendlease IPO subscription results as it's not showing on my SGX statements?Does anyone know how we can check the results of Lendlease IPO subscription results? I have checked my SGX statements and they don't show of me having any holdings of Lendlease. So I bided $x amount of money before 30 September the closing date. And I got back the same amount $x on 01 October, except for the $2 admin fee paid to DBS for the application.Is anyone in the same situation or experiencing something different? Thanks in advance for your help!2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered 2w agoHi there, if your $x was refunded in full, it means you didn't get any allocation. So it won't be showing up on your statements.You will have to buy from the stock market should you wish to get it.2 comments4

Question Poster2w agoThanks for the clarification Elijah!Elijah Lee2w agoWelcome. It's gone up now, so I personally would wait for a pull back, as well as to assess the REIT's method of raising funds in future (private placement or will they give retail investor rights issues to participate) before I decide. They only have 2 properties now after all.
Ernest Yeam Wee LeongLevel 5. GeniusUpdated 2w agoThe easiest way to check is to go to CDP website to check your holdings. https://www1.cdp.sgx.com/sgx-cdp-web/login2 comments1

Question Poster2w agoThanks Ernest, I bidded more than half a hundred grand but didn't get any holdings. Guess it's really over-subscriptionErnest Yeam Wee Leong2w agoThe allocation was probably geared towards users who bidded for less 10,000 shares to have as many investors to have ownership in it
i bidded 5000 shares and got 2000 whereas a friend put up 20,000 shares but got none instead.
you can get it from open market if you think the price is still undervalued or reasonable
